name: Strange Encounters
description:
Title: Strange Encounters

Platform: Browser HTML

Genre: Text-based Adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: Casual gamers

Game Overview: This game follows the narrative of a Captain of a ship that has encountered an alien species in the vast expanses of space. The style of encounter can be decided with the first choice, and is based off of the new Stellaris diplomatic meeting system. After this initial meeting, the scenarios branch out into different and unique situations.

Game Design Team: 

Joel Roth - Game Designer
